title: Hydrological Model - LinearReservoirMethod
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of the linear reservoir entity, which describes the linear reservoir baseflow method. This method assumes a linear reservoir to model the recession of baseflow after a storm event. It is associated with the Subasin entity.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be LinearReservoirMethod

layers.description: A number indicating the number of groundwater layers. (Minimum:0, Maximum:3) (required).

initialType.description: A text representing the initial discharge type.

flowType.description: A text representing the baseflow type of each groundwater layer.

initial.description: A number specifying the initial baseflow as volume per area per time or in volume per time. Units: M3/S/KM2 or M3/S (for the metric unit system) or CFS/MI2 or CFS (for the English unit system) (required).

frac.description: A number determining how water from the loss method is split to the groundwater layers. Minimum:0 and Maximum: 1(required).

coef.description: A number determining the time constant of each groundwater layer. Units: Hours (required).

res.description: A number determining the number of steps used to subdivide the routing through the groundwater layer. Units: unitless. (required)
